recipe.title: Beet Carpaccio with Goat Cheese and Arugula
ingredients: 3 medium beets, peeled and stems trimmed to 2 inches
1 large Belgian endive, thickly sliced crosswise
instructions: Using stems as a handle, slice beets paper-thin with slicer (wear protective gloves to avoid staining hands). Toss with vinegar and 1/4 teaspoon salt in a bowl, then let stand 5 minutes to wilt. Divide beets among 4 large plates, overlapping slices slightly. Top with goat cheese. Toss arugula and endive with 1 tablespoon oil and salt and pepper to taste, then mound over goat cheese. Drizzle beets with remaining 2 tablespoons oil.
